bibliography:

Philosophie: Hans-Georg Gadamer im Gespräche, Heidelberg:
C. Winer Universitäts Verlag.

J.C.B. Mohr.

Siebeck).

Gadamer, Hans-Georg, 1989 (TM), Truth and Method, London:

Reflections and Commentary, English translation of Dutt (ed.)

Haven: Yale University Press.
Clark, Timothy, 2008, The Poetics of Singularity, The Counter-Culturalist Turn in Heidegger, Derrida, Blanchot and the later Gadamer, Edinburgh: Edinburgh University Press.

Connor, Steven, 1992, “Modernism and Postmodernism” in
Cooper, 1992, pp. 288–293.

Oxford: Blackwell.

Dostal, Robert J., 2002, The Cambridge Companion to
Gadamer, Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.
Gjesdal,Kristin, 2009, Gadamer and the Legacy of German Idealism, Cambridge, Cambridge University Press.

State University of New York Press.
